exceptions.exn: In environment T : Type m, n : nat x0 : T u : nat -> nat -> T i, j : nat H1 : (i < m)%nat H2 : (j < n)%nat Unable to unify "u i j" with "(fix coeff_Tn (T : Type) (n : nat) (x0 : T) {struct n} : Tn n T -> nat -> T := match n as n0 return (Tn n0 T -> nat -> T) with | 0%nat => fun (_ : unit) (_ : nat) => x0 | S n' => fun (v : T * Tn n' T) (i : nat) => match i with | 0%nat => fst v | S i0 => coeff_Tn T n' x0 (snd v) i0 end end) T n x0 ((fix coeff_Tn (T : Type) (n : nat) (x0 : T) {struct n} : Tn n T -> nat -> T := match n as n0 return (Tn n0 T -> nat -> T) with | 0%nat => fun (_ : unit) (_ : nat) => x0 | S n' => fun (v : T * Tn n' T) (i : nat) => match i with | 0%nat => fst v | S i0 => coeff_Tn T n' x0 (snd v) i0 end end) (Tn n T) m (mk_Tn n (fun _ : nat => x0)) (mk_Tn m (fun i : nat => mk_Tn n (u i))) i) j".

original: intros i j H1 H2. unfold coeff_mat. unfold mk_matrix. unfold coeff_Tn. simpl. reflexivity.
